snippet: Canadian coach John Herdman was thanking his lucky stars on Saturday after his team avoided the so-called 'Group of Death' and landed in a challenging but familiar pool at the 2015 Women's World Cup draw on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Canada Thanking Their Luck After World Cup Draw
headline.main: Canada Thanking Their Luck After World Cup Draw

lead_paragraph: Canadian coach John Herdman was thanking his lucky stars on Saturday after his team avoided the so-called 'Group of Death' and landed in a challenging but familiar pool at the 2015 Women's World Cup draw on Saturday.
